body_html: You need to write shape inference routines in C++. This is part of moving more functionality into core c++ so other language bindings are more useful. You can search the code for .SetShapeFn to see a bunch of examples. It is done through named constructor argument idiom by providing a C++11 lambda function. Post back if you need more help. (The release notes do mention this and what to do, though more tersely)

body: You need to write shape inference routines in C++. This is part of moving more functionality into core c++ so other language bindings are more useful.  You can search the code for `.SetShapeFn` to see a bunch of examples. It is done through named constructor  argument idiom by providing a C++11 lambda function. Post back if you need more help. (The release notes do mention this and what to do, though more tersely)
